subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Debbie Caruso
author: Kim Sharples
full_text:
so sorry to hear this... what happened?


On Sat, Jan 23, 2010 at 3:01 PM, psi_research <vilhellm@...>wrote:

>
>
> Keith at ITC Bridge sent a memo stating Debbie Caruso passed last night.
> Some of you may know of Debbie's work through the AA-EVP or her many tv
> appearances, or perhaps her website http://www.1800heaven.com/aboutme.htm
>
> I met her at the 2006 AA-EVP Atlanta conference and witnessed how she could
> easily record and playback evps right on the spot for people that were
> curious about evps. She was one of the 1st people that I met that seemed to
> be an evp magnet. She made a real contribution to the field and her work
> will always be appreciated.
> -bill
>
>
